nodes.text: A deck officer of Flight Deck Officer was a military rank bestowed upon starship crewmembers, usually officers, who frequented the deck of the starship, but held no responsibility for running that vessel's operations.
CT-327 was the deck officer of the Rishi Station during the Clone Wars. He died during the Battle of the Rishi moon in 22 BBY.
An unnamed crewman held this rank aboard Admiral Giel's flagship.
Lieutenant Bendlar Kovings served as the Flight Deck Officer for Drop Point: Gelgelar during the Galactic Civil War.
